title: Client keeps crashing
body: At least 5 times my client has crashed mid champ select and has given me a 6 min wait queue each time. At first i figured whatever but now its just getting really annoying. idk if its my computer or what but im also worried about receiving a big penalty for it. plz halp.

replies.body:
Crashes during champ select are almost always caused by a sudden disconnection from the servers. The most common causes for the sudden disconnection are either local network settings that conflict with League or a poor route to the server. As a necessary first step, I encourage you to ensure your network settings are in line with those listed on our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those configurations caused any change.
